response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on its value of $12,000 to you. I am confident it will meet your needs and expectations. To make this opportunity available to you, I am proposing a price of $10,000 for the product. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent value considering its high worth to you. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.", "product_price": 10000}
